data.name: F*ckable Kim
data.detailed_description:
In this 2D fighting game you have to save the humanity from a cruel, ruthless, and bloody dictator aspiring to the world hegemony.

After the president of the great, free, democratic, and peaceful America — Mr. Donya — received a threat from F*ckable Kim — the dictator of the distant kingdom called Sh*ttychickea, he sent a secret agent there. When the secret agent found out the location of an enemy's nuclear weapons plant, he sneaked into the plant unnoticed and neutralized the guards. After taking over the enemy's plant, the secret agent sneaked into F*ckable Kim's lair and fought him.

This game combines the fighting and visual novel genres: the story alternates with fights where the hand-to-hand combat is simulated by a few characters within an arena. Fighting as various characters against various opponents, find out how the confrontation with the cruel dictator will end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11/10
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11/10
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster with two or more cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts violence and partial nudity, as well as contains bad language.
